attributes.action: Replace the BBC Director General and Board Of Trustees (Vote of No Confidence) over the Brand-Ross Scandel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because of the slow response by the BBC's Director General, and its board of trustee's in the Russell Brand and Jonothan Ross scandel, and the punitive action they have taken against Ross, I ask that the prime minister replace the Director General and Trustee's forthwith. Licence payers in their 10's of thousands have clearly shown that they were outraged by this behaviour that was broadcast, it was immoral, and offensive. The Director General, has dithered on this occasion, and clearly should have made a statement about the whole affair immediately. He didn't, and has shown the public he is not capable of performing his duty, in the office that he is employed by.
